channel.title: RUNE-UNITY614 || SPAWN/PKING || Advertising Thread
channel.description:
What is Rune-Unity 614?
Rune-Unity is a spawn/eco style PvP server which means you can spawn most items with exception to Barrows pieces, PvP armour/weapons, Godwars items, rares and basically any other items that are purchasable from the shops. Also, here at Rune-Unity, we have a very friendly and active staff team including a very dedicated management team.
Here is a list of our main features:
Instant PKing Home is Grand Exchange Many PK areas Quick prayer Flawless Combat Fully functioning magic books. Fully functioning prayer Amazing combat Perfect switching Helpful and friendly Staff Dicing Constant updates Fantastic vote rewards Automatic vote system Automatic donation system Many shops Stable economy Working prayerbooks Working spellbooks Custom Items(One of first 614 servers to have customs) VPS hosted 24/7
[U][SIZE=6]SCREEENSHOT[/SIZE][/U]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/aiZBhiQ.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IPbwGIM.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4O477WZ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R6klYj4.png[/img]
[U][SIZE=6]LINKS[/SIZE][/U]
Downloadable JAR Client: (Also Located On Our Home Page) [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/sh41cf27c6wemf3/Rune-Unity.jar?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/sh41cf27c6wemf3/Rune-Unity.jar?dl=0[/URL]
Home Page: [URL=http://"http://www.rune-unity.net/"]http://www.rune-unity.net/[/URL]
Forums: [URL=http://"http://www.rune-unity.net/forum/"]http://www.rune-unity.net/forum/[/URL]

item.title: RUNE-UNITY614 || SPAWN/PKING || Advertising Thread
item.dc:creator: @RuneUnity RuneUnity
item.description:
@RuneUnity wrote:

I just started playing - absolutely love it! Staff are great, no lag, perfect shops… Geez if only id found it faster xD my in-game name is Bob <3 <3 <3 i’d recommend this to my friends anyday

Read full topic
